sentence.Network_en: Today was really a bit of a write-off for me.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天对我来说真的有点儿白白浪费了。

sentence.Network_en: I'm going to write him in on my ballot next year.
sentence.Network_cn: 明年我要在我的选票上写上他的名字。

sentence.Network_en: The car was a write-off, but everyone escaped unharmed.
sentence.Network_cn: 这辆车报废了，但人员全部安全逃离。

phrase.cizu_name: be nothing to write home about

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)be very mediocre or unexceptional
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)不值得大书特书的；不十分好的，平庸的

phrase.cizu_name: be (或 have something) written all over one (或 one'

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)used to convey that the presence of a particular quality or feeling is clearly revealed by a person's expression
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)全写在某人的脸上

lj.lj_ly: guilt was written all over his face.
guilt was written all over his face.

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)used to convey that there is or was nothing more to be said about a matter
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)全都写上了；没有其他要说的

lj.lj_ly: we were arguing about who should pay the bill, but he pulled out a couple of hundreds and that's all she wrote.
lj.lj_ls: 我们正在争论谁该付账，但他掏出了两三张百元大钞，她也就没什么可说的了。

jx.jx_en_mean: reduce the nominal value of stock or goods
jx.jx_cn_mean: 降低…的账面价值

jx.jx_en_mean: (chiefly US)(when voting) add the name of someone not on the original list of candidates and vote for them
jx.jx_cn_mean: (主美)在（选票上）加写（非原定候选人）的名字；投（非原定候选人）的票

jx.jx_en_mean: (write someone/thing off)dismiss someone or something as insignificant
jx.jx_cn_mean: 把…看得无关紧要

lj.lj_ly: they were written off as a bunch of no-hopers.
lj.lj_ls: 他们作为一群没有希望的人而不被重视。

jx.jx_en_mean: cancel the record of a bad debt; acknowledge the loss of or failure to recover an asset
jx.jx_cn_mean: 勾销（不良债务等）；承认损失（资产）

lj.lj_ly: he urged the banks to write off debt owed by poorer countries.
lj.lj_ls: 他催促银行勾销穷国所欠的债务。

jx.jx_en_mean: write a full or formal account of something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 详细记叙；正式报道

lj.lj_ly: I was too tired to write up my notes.
lj.lj_ls: 我太累了，无法详细地记笔记。

jx.jx_en_mean: To set down in writing.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写下：用文字的方式记下

jx.jx_en_mean: To reduce in rank, value, or price.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 贬低、降价：减低级别、贬低价值或价格

jx.jx_en_mean: To disparage in writing.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写文章贬损

jx.jx_en_mean: To write in a conspicuously simple or condescending style
jx.jx_cn_mean: 浅显地写：以浅显或谦逊的风格写

lj.lj_ly: felt he had to write down to his students.
lj.lj_ls: 感觉到他必须写得浅显学生才能看懂

jx.jx_en_mean: To cast a vote by inserting (a name not listed on a ballot).
jx.jx_cn_mean: 投票给：通过插入（候选名单上未列出的名字）来投票

jx.jx_en_mean: To insert in a text or document
jx.jx_cn_mean: 加写于正文或文件中

lj.lj_ly: wrote in an apology at the end of the note.
lj.lj_ls: 在纸条末尾加上一句道歉的话

jx.jx_en_mean: To communicate with an organization by mail
jx.jx_cn_mean: 以书信联络：与某个组织以邮件通讯的方式交往

lj.lj_ly: write in with a completed entry form.
lj.lj_ls: 写信并附上填好的申请表

jx.jx_en_mean: To reduce to zero the book value of (an asset that has become worthless).
jx.jx_cn_mean: 折价：把（已变得无价值的资产的）帐面价值减低为零

jx.jx_en_mean: To cancel from accounts as a loss.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 勾销：作为亏损从帐目上勾销

jx.jx_en_mean: To consider as a loss or failure
jx.jx_cn_mean: 视为损失或失败

lj.lj_ly: wrote off the rainy first day of the vacation.
lj.lj_ls: 假期第一天就下雨真扫兴

jx.jx_en_mean: To express or compose in writing
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写出，作曲：以书面表达或创作

jx.jx_en_mean: To write in full or expanded form
jx.jx_cn_mean: 完全写出：写出全称或完整的形式

lj.lj_ly: All abbreviations are to be written out.
lj.lj_ls: 所有的缩写都要完整地写出来

jx.jx_en_mean: To write a report or description of, as for publication.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 报导：如为公布、出版而写报告或描写

jx.jx_en_mean: To bring (a journal, for example) up to date.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 写日志：把（如，日志）等补写到最近的日期

jx.jx_en_mean: To overstate the value of (assets).
jx.jx_cn_mean: 对资产高估：过高估评（一笔资产）的价值

jx.jx_en_mean: To report (someone) in writing, as for breaking the law
jx.jx_cn_mean: （写传票）告发：写传票告发（某人）违反法规

jx.jx_en_mean: To set one's own terms or course of action entirely according to one's own needs or wishes
jx.jx_cn_mean: 自订计划，自行决定：按照某人自己的需求或愿望决定做事、行动的步骤和计划

lj.lj_ly: an open-ended and generous scholarship that lets recipients write their own ticket.
lj.lj_ls: 让受领者自行决定的无限额且大笔的奖学金

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English wrītan 'score, form (letters) by carving, write', of Germanic origin; related to German reissen 'sketch, drag'

encyclopedia.content: 简介 函数名： write 功 能： 写到一文件中 用 法： int write(int handle, void *buf, int nbyte); 从buf所指向的缓冲区中提取nbyte个字节写入到参数handle所指的文件中 程序例： #include <stdlib.h> #include <unistd.h> #include <stdio.h> #include <string.h> #include <fcntl.h> #include <errno.h> int main(void) { int handle; char string[40]; int length, res; /* Create a fil

entry.def: When you write something on a surface, you use something such as a pen or pencil to produce words, letters, or numbers on the surface.

example.ex: If you'd like one, simply write your name and address on a postcard and send it to us...
example.tran: 如果你想要一个的话，只要把姓名、住址写在一张明信片上寄给我们就行。

example.ex: They were still trying to teach her to read and write...
example.tran: 他们还在试图教她读书写字。

entry.def: If you write something such as a book, a poem, or a piece of music, you create it and record it on paper or perhaps on a computer.

example.ex: I had written quite a lot of orchestral music in my student days...
example.tran: 我在学生时代创作过很多管弦乐作品。

example.ex: Finding a volunteer to write the computer program isn't a problem...
example.tran: 找个志愿者编这个计算机程序不成问题。

entry.tran: 写作，著述（通常以出版为目的）
entry.def: Someone who writes creates books, stories, or articles, usually for publication.

example.ex: She writes for many papers, including the Sunday Times...
example.tran: 她给包括《星期日泰晤士报》在内的很多报纸撰稿。

entry.tran: 写(信);给…写信(美国英语亦可用 write someone)
entry.def: When you write to someone or write them a letter, you give them information, ask them something, or express your feelings in a letter. In American English, you can also write someone.

example.ex: Many people have written to me on this subject...
example.tran: 很多人给我写信探讨这个问题。

example.ex: She had written him a note a couple of weeks earlier...
example.tran: 她几周前给他写过一个便条。

entry.def: If someone writes that something is the case, they say it in a letter, book, or article.

example.ex: 'Some six months later,' Freud writes, 'Hans had got over his jealousy.'...
example.tran: “大约6个月后，”弗洛伊德写道，“汉斯克服了他的嫉妒心理。”

example.ex: A few days later he wrote that he had hopes of a staff job.
example.tran: 几天后，他写信说他有望得到一份行政工作。

entry.def: When someone writes something such as a cheque, receipt, or prescription, they put the necessary information on it and usually sign it.

example.ex: Snape wrote a receipt with a gold fountain pen...
example.tran: 斯内普用金笔开了一张收据。

example.ex: I'll write you a cheque in a moment.
example.tran: 我过会儿给你开张支票。

entry.def: If you write to a computer or a disk, you record data on it.

example.ex: You should write-protect all disks that you do not usually need to write to.
example.tran: 你应该对你通常不需要写入内容的磁盘进行写保护。

means.word_mean: 3. have (one's written work) issued for publication;

sentences.sentence: "How many books did Georges Simenon write?"
"She published 25 books during her long career"
"He wrote that he would be coming soon"

means.word_mean: 7. mark or trace on a surface;

sentences.sentence: "The artist wrote Chinese characters on a big piece of white paper"
"boot-up instructions are written on the hard disk"

means.word_mean: 9. write or name the letters that comprise the conventionally accepted form of (a word or part of a word);

sentences.sentence: "He spelled the word wrong in this letter"

list.explanation: 微不足道，引不起兴趣，不令人兴奋，不十分好

example.en: I got a little bit of a raise this year，but it was nothing to write home about.
example.zh: 今年我得到一点提升，但并不值得一提。

example.en: His pitch was nothing to write home about.

auth_sentence.content: Write down all the important facts as you listen.
auth_sentence.res_content: Write down all the important facts as you listen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Write down all the important facts as you listen.

auth_sentence.content: We're trying to write good stuff on it.
auth_sentence.res_content: We're trying to write good stuff on it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We're trying to write good stuff on it.

auth_sentence.content: Black Dice are a rock band who write songs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Black Dice are a rock band who write songs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Black Dice are a rock band who write songs.

sentences.en: When he was very young, he began to learn to read and write.
sentences.cn: 他很小的时候就开始学习读书写字了。

sentences.en: I have been writing this week.
Let's write a notice of next Friday's meeting.
sentences.cn: 我们来写一份关于下星期五开会的通知。

sentences.en: After she wrote the melody, she asked us for criticisms.
sentences.cn: 她做好曲之后, 请我们提意见。
他写下了所看到的情况。

sentences.en: We have had another performance of the play since I wrote.
sentences.cn: 从我上次给你写信之后, 这个剧我们又演出了一次。

sentences.en: Write me, and let me know how things go.
sentences.cn: 望来信, 谈谈你那儿的情况。

sentences.en: My son wrote to say he was coming from Paris this week.
sentences.cn: 我的儿子来信说他这个星期从巴黎来。

sentences.en: She writes that she is leaving tomorrow.
I wrote my mother a letter hurriedly.
sentences.cn: 我匆忙地给我母亲写了封信。

sentences.en: Don't forget to write all the news to me.
sentences.cn: 不要忘记把一切消息都写信告诉我。

sentences.en: She wrote Bass that his father was not well.
sentences.cn: 她给巴斯写信, 说他爸爸身体不舒服。

sentences.en: Write me when you get home.

jushi.english: I should have written yesterday, but I was not fit.
jushi.chinese: 我本来应该昨天写信的,但我身体不舒服。
